Prompt Summary: A summary of the prompt that I'm including in the prompt library. What did I wish to achieve with it?
Prompt Text: The actual text of the prompt that I have been using
Version: For high-performing or important prompts I'll sometimes set up a basic version control system, assigning versions to the iterations of the prompt, starting with V1.0
GPT(s): Notes of any GPT models that I have been using this prompt with. If you're storing this data in a relational database, this would be a great column to store a relationship between the prompt and the GPTs you're using it with
Notes: Notes on the prompt: what works, what doesn't
Ideas For Improvement: Ideas to make the prompt more effective
